17218.「おお <pc>か！ よく来てくれた。\n ヒメア様が そなたと\n アカシを:
Oh, <pc>! Good to see you.
Lady Himea requested to see both you
and Akashi.

17219.「ちょうど アカシも来たようだな。\n さあ ふたりとも 入るがよい。:
And Akashi is here right on time.
Come on, let's go inside.

17220.「<pc> そして アカシ……。\n よくぞ 来てくれました。:
<pc>, Akashi... Thank you both for
coming.

17221.「……そなたたちと 別れたあとで\n 私も すこし 考えてみたのです。:
...After I had left, I did some thinking for
myself.

17222.「コハクが あのようなことにならなければ\n 私たちは ３００年前に\n ふたり:
If Kohaku hadn't ended up the way he did,
then the two of us would've had a
wedding ceremony 300 years ago.

17223.「もしも そなたたちの言うとおり\n コハクが その約束を 覚えているのなら……:
If what you said is true, and Kokahu does
remember that promise...

17224.「コハクは 私たちが 誓いの盃を\n 交わすはずだった 約束の地……\n 世界樹:
Then he likely has gone to the place we
promised to exchange the Cup of Vows...
Yggdrahill.

17225.「そなたたちの 言葉を信じて\n 私は 世界樹の丘へ 行きましょう。:
I will believe in your words and I will go
there.

17226.「<pc>。アカシ。そなたたちも\n ともに 世界樹の丘に 行ってくれますか？\:
Will the two of you come with me?
I would like you to witness what becomes
of us.

17227.「<pc>さんが 行くなら\n あたしも行きます！:
If <pc> goes, then I'm going
too!

17229.「世界樹の丘は この村の 東にある\n 久遠の森を抜けた先です。\n すぐに 出:
Yggdrahill is just east of the village, past
the Forest of Eternity. We should make our
way there immediately.

17230.「私は 先に 世界樹の丘へ向かいます。\n そなたたちも 準備ができたら\n す:
I will go on ahead to Yggdrahill first.
Please come as soon as you are ready.

17231.「礼を言います <pc>。\n ……しかし そなたのことを\n 多くの者が 必要:
I am grateful, <pc>, but...
It seems there are many others who are
in need of your help right now.

17232.「ならば そなたは その者たちの所へ\n 行くべきでしょう。わざわざ 呼び立てて:
I think you should go to their aid first.
I apologize for calling you here.

17233.「……そうですか。\n 残念ですが そなたが そう言うのなら\n あきらめるほか:
I see... While it is a shame, I have no choice
but to give up if that is what you wish.

17234.「まあ…… ふたりとも\n 戻ってきてくれたのですね。: My... I see the both of you have returned.

17235.「私は コハクが いることを信じ\n これより 世界樹の丘へ 行くつもりです。\:
I am going to make my way to Yggdrahill, as
I believe that Kohaku will be there.
The place we promised to meet...

17236.「<pc>……アカシ。そなたたちも\n ともに 世界樹の丘に 行ってくれますか？:
Will the two of you come with me?
I would like you to witness what becomes
of us.

17238.「……思えば そなたと最初に出会ったのも \n この丘であったな。: ...It was on this hill that we first met.

17239.「あれから ３００年…… \n 時が流れ 世が移ろいゆく中で\n 私と そなたの:
Three hundred years have passed since that
day. As time flows and the world changes,
time stands still for only you and I...

17240.「そのことが 不幸なのかどうかさえ\n 今の私には もはや わからぬ。\n ただ:
I'm not even sure if that can be called
unfortunate or not anymore. It's just...

17241.「永遠に思えた我が命も まもなく尽きるようだ。\n この世界樹が 花をつけようと:
This eternal life I thought I had will soon
come to an end. This tree will soon blossom.

17242.「数百年に一度咲く 世界樹の花……。\n 花が咲くのを見届ければ 我が役割は終わ:
The Yggdrasil Flower blooms once every few
hundred years...and once I witness that, my
duty will be complete.

17243.「未練はない。我が身が 朽ちるのならば\n これもまた さだめ……。\n 私は:
I have no regrets. If this body is to perish, then...so be it. This too is my fate. Until that time comes, I simply will do what must
be done.

17245.「その獣を殺されては 困りますよ ヒメア様。\n 私の貴重な 研究材料でしてね。:
I cannot allow you to kill that beast.
It's much too valuable for my research.

17246.「きさま……まだ 不老の術を欲するか……。:
You... Still you desire the art of
immortality...?

17247.「永遠の命は 生きとし生ける者の\n 共通の夢でしょう？ いかなるリスクがあろう:
Eternal life is a common dream among all
living beings, is it not? It is worth the
risk, no matter the cost... Huh?

17253.「なぜ 戻ってきた <cs_pchero>！\n 今のコハクは 怒りで 我を忘れ:
Why have you returned?! Kohaku has gone
berserk with anger! You have to hurry and
leave this place!

17261.「そなたは 私に……人としての幸福と\n 生きることの意味を 教えてくれた。:
You were the one who taught me...what it
means to live, and the happiness of life
itself.

17262.「代わりに 私は そなたに\n なにを与えられただろう？\n すべてを奪い ３０:
What could I have possibly given you in
exchange? I took everything from you, and
locked you away for three hundred years...

17263.「長い間 苦しめて すまなかった。\n せめて今 我が手で 黄泉へと送ろう。:
I am sorry for causing you so much pain...
All I can do for you now is to finally deliver
you from your suffering.

17265.「そなたは この丘で 婚礼の儀を行う約束を\n 忘れずにいてくれたのだな……。:
You remembered our promise about our
ceremony on this hill...

17266.「今 そなたとの約束を 果たそう。: Now, I shall fulfill my promise to you.

17267.「風よ。この盃に 清めの酒を。:
Great winds...
Please fill this cup with Sacred Sake.

17268.「そして 願わくば 我らに祝福を……。: And then, I prayーmay we be blessed...

17269.「さあ コハク。これで我らも夫婦になれた。: See, Kohaku? We are now husband and wife.

17270.「ともに生きることが かなわぬのなら\n せめて ともに この世を去ろう。:
If we cannot live together, then let us at
least leave this world together.

17271.「私が死のうとも 世界樹は じきに花をつける。\n この程度の自由は 許されるだ:
Even with my death, Yggdrasil will soon blossom. This small freedom should be permissible...it is the least I can do to
atone for my sins.

17274.「あの ラブレターにはなあ！\n 男の一生分の すんげー覚悟が つまってんだ。\:
That love letter is chock-full of one man's
lifelong resolve!! And you're gonna step on
it just like that?!

17275.「オイラたちの夢を こわすってのか！: Are you trying to crush our dreams?!

17276.「そうですよ……！ コハクさんは\n こんな…… ヒック……つぐないなんて\n:
He's right! There's no way Kohaku would...
*hic*...want to be punished like this!

17277.「死んじゃうなんて やめてください。\n ヒメア様 お願いです……。\n ぜった:
Please don't die... I'm begging you, Lady
Himea... You can't... Never ever...

17280.「師は 教えることよりも\n 教えられることのほうが多いと言うが……\n 本当に:
They say a teacher has more to learn than to
teach... Perhaps that is true.

17281.「学びの庭を作り 子供たちに\n 学問の道を開こうと言ったのは\n コハクだった:
It was Kokahu's suggestion to create the
Garden of Learning, so that children would
have a path of knowledge...

17283.「ともに生きることは かなわなかったが……\n ここに 我らの子供たちがいるのだ:
Although living together was not meant to
be... These here are our children.

17285.「ツスクルの村へ 帰りましょう。\n 私は 世界樹の守り手であり\n そなたたち:
Let us return to Tsuskuru Village. I am the
guardian of Yggdrasilーand your guide as
students.

17286.「皆 後で 私の屋敷へ来てください。: Please meet me in my mansion later.

17287.「やれやれ……。私は おいとましますよ。\n あんな 不完全な禁術など\n 私の:
What a pity... I will take my leave, then.
A flawed art such as this does not suit
my sense of aesthetic.

17289.「そなたたちへの 感謝の気持ちとしては\n これでは 足りないかもしれませんが…:
This may not be enough to express my gratitude
to you, but...please accept it as a token of
my appreciation.

17290.「……この館からは 学びの庭の様子が\n とても よく見えるのです。:
From here, you can see the Garden of
Learning quite clearly.

17291.「走り回る子…… 転んで泣く子。\n 木陰で 本を読む子。\n 食べてばかりいる:
A child running... A child scraping their
knee, crying... A child reading a book under
a tree... A child who loves eating snacks...

17292.「皆 私と コハクの子なのだと思った途端\n この世を去ることが 悲しくなりまし:
When I came to realize that they are all the
children of Kohaku and I, the thought of
leaving this world filled me with sadness.

17293.「この残された命は 学徒たちのために\n 使うことにしましょう。\n 最期まで:
I will use what life I have left for the sake
of the students here. I will be by their side
until I breathe my final breath.

17294.「コハクには もうしばらく\n 黄泉の入り口で 待っていてもらいましょう。\n:
Kohaku will have to wait for me in the next
life a little while longer.
Surely, he will forgive me...
